amendment.description: An amendment numbered 72 printed in Part A of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds from being used to carry out the unfunded priorities list.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to prohibit funds from being used to require the Department of Defense to create unfunded priorities lists, which list defense and intelligence-related priorities that are not included in the President's budget.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 251 (Roll no. 325).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jayapal amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 161 - 251 (Roll no. 325).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
